title: Compass direction of magnetic force on wire

content.prompt: Four conducting wires perpendicular to the plane of the page are at the corners of a square, as shown in cross section in the figure above. The wires carry equal currents in the same direction. What is the direction of the total magnetic force on wire X caused by the other three wires?

choices.label: In none of the directions above, since the magnitude of the force is zero
